description: This file implements a React component for handling OAuth callback flow for Confluence integration, displaying success or error messages based on URL parameters, and redirecting accordingly.

methods.name: ConfluenceOAuthCallbackPage
methods.description: Main component that wraps the inner OAuth callback logic within a Suspense boundary.

methods.name: ConfluenceOAuthCallbackInner
methods.description: Handles the OAuth callback logic: parsing URL parameters, updating state based on success or error, and redirecting.
